mainText.attr1: Research allows you to increase your ship and platform building options.
This crew consumes resources - but doesn't produce them.
If there are no research items, crew goes back to producing resources (no need to micro manage).
Only bases of the original faction of the research can conduct the research.
Some research items have pre-requisites - for example the Perez M variant needs the Perez G to be first researched.
Research is done in the research interface - see image on right for the button
Select the research from the list then click the add button or double click to add to the research queue.
Make sure to allocate crew to research.
I've planned for research to be more interesting:
Capturing enemy ships would yield research of a similar ship.
When research would be first completed - a more powerful prototype would automatically launch.
Oh well... there's always the future.
